revised_title: Richard Edmund Reason: A Life of Innovation and Achievement
tldr: Richard Edmund Reason was a talented engineer and inventor who made significant contributions to the fields of optics, kinematics, and mechanical engineering. He worked at Taylor, Taylor & Hobson, where he developed the electrolimit gauge and the Fincham Coincidence Optometer. Reason's life was also marked by his love of music and his family's influence on his upbringing and interests.
